instructions: On your iPhone or iPad, open Google Podcasts . Tap Search . Enter the podcast s name. Tap the podcast and then Subscribe .
On your iPhone or iPad, open Google Podcasts . Tap Search . You ll see recommendations. Optional : Choose a podcast genre. At the top, tap on a category, like Comedy .

On your iPhone or iPad, open Google Podcasts . To find: All available episodes of a podcast: Tap the podcast. Episode details: Tap the episode name. In-progress or downloaded episodes: At the bottom, tap Activity . New Episodes : At the bottom, tap Home .
On your iPhone or iPad, open Google Podcasts . Next to any episode, tap Add to playlist . Items in your playlist will have Added to playlist next to them.
On your iPhone or iPad, open Google Podcasts . At the top right, tap your profile picture or initial. Tap Add another account or choose the account you want to use.
On your iPhone or iPad, open Google Podcasts . At the bottom, tap Activity and then Your queue . Next to the episode, touch and hold Move , then drag it where you want.

On your iPhone or IPad, open Google Podcasts . At the bottom, tap Activity and then Your queue . To remove: A single episode : Next to the episode, tap Added to playlist . All episodes : At the top, tap More and then Clear your queue .
